bibl.title: The True History of the So-Called Artemidorus Papyrus, with an interim text. Translations by Paul JARVIS, Ruth Anne HENDERSON and Margherita LOSACCO. (Ἔκδοσις. 5).
bibl.note: P. Coll. privées (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). - On the history of Artemidorus' text. - Bibliological observations on the new Artemidorus (by Rosa OTRANTO). - What did the papyrus contain when it was 'whole'? - The many lives of fr. 21 of Artemidorus. - Why this papyrus cannot be Artemidorus. - Images. - An interim text.
bibl.seg: CANFORA Luciano, The True History of the So-Called Artemidorus Papyrus, with an interim text. Translations by Paul JARVIS, Ruth Anne HENDERSON and Margherita LOSACCO. (Ἔκδοσις. 5).
Bari, Edizioni di Pagina, 2007, 8°, iv-199 pp., 8 pll. ISBN 978-88-7470-044-8. €16.

P. Coll. privées (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). - On the history of Artemidorus' text. - Bibliological observations on the new Artemidorus (by Rosa OTRANTO). - What did the papyrus contain when it was 'whole'? - The many lives of fr. 21 of Artemidorus. - Why this papyrus cannot be Artemidorus. - Images. - An interim text.

C.R. par Richard Janko, CR N.S., 59 (2009) pp. 403-410, 6 figg. [concerne aussi: Claudio GALLAZZI, Bärbel KRAMER, Salvatore SETTIS (edito da), Il Papiro di Artemidoro (P. Artemid.) (Milano, 2008); - Luciano CANFORA, con contributi di vari autori, Il papiro di Artemidoro = Storia e Società (Roma, 2008)].
